mapper.insert:
insert into package_measure ( uuid, name, classes, functions, ncss, java_docs, java_docs_lines, single_comment_lines, multi_comment_lines, commit_id, commit_time, repo_id ) values
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.name}, #{item.classes}, #{item.functions}, #{item.ncss}, #{item.javaDocs}, #{item.javaDocsLines}, #{item.singleCommentLines}, #{item.multiCommentLines}, #{item.commit_id}, #{item.commit_time}, #{item.repo_id} )
